    AddApptAction  
    AddERespAction
    Used for Add Personnel page (addPersonnel.jsp).
    AddHCPAction
    Used for Add Personnel page (addPersonnel.jsp).
    AddOfficeVisitAction
    Used for Document Office Visit page (documentOfficeVisit.jsp).
    AddPatientAction
    Used for Add Patient page (addPatient.jsp).
    AddPHAAction
    Used for Add Personnel page (addPersonnel.jsp).
    AddRemoteMonitoringDataAction
    Handles adding remote monitoring patient data to the database
    AddUAPAction
    Used for Add Personnel page (addPersonnel.jsp).
    ChangeSessionTimeoutAction
    Used to change the session timeout, sessionTimeout.jsp.
    ChronicDiseaseRiskAction
    Used for chronicDiseaseRisks.jsp.
    DeclareHCPAction
    Used by the patient to declare HCPs as "designated", in editHCPs.jsp.
    DrugInteractionAction
    Used by EditDrugInteraction.jsp to edit and get information about drug interactions.
    EditApptTypeAction  
    EditHealthHistoryAction
    Edits the health history of a patient, used by editBasicHealth.jsp
    EditMonitoringListAction
    Handles changes (adds and removes) to the monitoring list for a certain HCP.
    EditOfficeVisitAction
    Edits the office visits of a patient Used by editOfficeVisit.jsp
    EditPatientAction
    Edits a patient Used by editPatient.jsp
    EditPersonnelAction
    Edits the designated personnel Used by admin/editPersonnel.jsp, staff/editMyDemographics.jsp, editPersonnel.jsp
    EditPHRAction
    Edits the patient health record for a given patient Used by editPHR.jsp
    EditPrescriptionAction
    Edits a patient's prescription information.
    EditRepresentativesAction
    Edits a patient's personal representatives.
    EmergencyReportAction
    Creates a new Emergency Report Used by emergencyReport.jsp
    GenerateCalendarAction
    Action class for calendar.jsp
    GetUserNameAction
    Handles Getting the person's name associated with a certain mid Used by getUser.jsp
    GetVisitRemindersAction
    Gets the VisitReminders for a given patient Used by visitReminders.jsp
    LabProcHCPAction
    Action class for LabProcHCP.jsp.
    LabProcUAPAction
    Class for LabProcUAP.jsp.
    LoginFailureAction
    Please note that this is not the best mitigation for Denial of Service attacks.
    ManageHospitalAssignmentsAction
    Manages the assignment of HCPs to hospitals Used by hospitalAssignments.jsp
    MonitorAdverseEventAction  
    MyDiagnosisAction
    Edits the privacy levels of diagnoses, used by myDiagnoses.jsp
    MyDiagnosisAction.HCPDiagnosisBeanComparator
    Checks to see what HCP has had the most experience with a diagnosis
    PrescriptionReportAction
    Handles Prescription Reports for the given pid Used by hcp-uap/getPrescriptionReport.jsp, hcp-uap/viewPrescriptionRecord.jsp, patient/getMyPrescriptionReport.jsp, & patient/viewMyPrescriptionRecord.jsp
    ReferralManagementAction
    Used for referring patients to other HCPs.
    ReportAdverseEventAction  
    ResetPasswordAction
    Manages resetting the password Used by resetPassword.jsp
    SearchUsersAction  
    SendMessageAction
    Class for SendMessage.jsp.
    SetSecurityQuestionAction
    Handles setting and retrieving the security questions/answers for users Used by patient/editMyDemographics.jsp, staff/editMyDemographics.jsp, staff/editPersonnell.jsp
    SurveyAction
    This class is used to add patient survey data to the database.
    UpdateCPTCodeListAction
    Updates the CPT Code (Medical Procedures) List Used by editCPTProcedureCodes.jsp The CPT code set accurately describes medical, surgical, and diagnostic services and is designed to communicate uniform information about medical services and procedures among physicians, coders, patients, accreditation organizations, and payers for administrative, financial, and analytical purposes.
    UpdateHospitalListAction
    Handles updating the list of hospitals Used by hospitalListing.jsp
    UpdateICDCodeListAction
    Handles updating the ICD Code (Diagnosis) List Used by editICDCodes.jsp The International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems (most commonly known by the abbreviation ICD) provides codes to classify diseases and a wide variety of signs, symptoms, abnormal findings, complaints, social circumstances and external causes of injury or disease.
    UpdateLOINCListAction
    Handles updating the LOINC Used.
    UpdateNDCodeListAction
    Handles updating the ND Code (Prescription) List Used by editNDCodes.jsp The National Drug Code (NDC) is a universal product identifier used in the United States for drugs intended for human use.
    ViewAdverseEventAction  
    ViewExpiredPrescriptionsAction
    Handles retrieving beans for viewPrescriptionRecords.jsp
    ViewMyAccessLogAction
    Handles retrieving the log of record accesses for a given user Used by viewAccessLog.jsp
    ViewMyApptsAction  
    ViewMyMessagesAction
    Action class for ViewMyMessages.jsp
    ViewMyRecordsAction
    Handles patients viewing their own records Used by viewMyRecords.jsp
    ViewMyRemoteMonitoringListAction
    Handles retrieving the patient data for a certain HCP as used by viewTelemedicineData.jsp
    ViewMyReportRequestsAction
    Action class for ViewMyReports.jsp.
    ViewOfficeVisitAction
    Handles viewing the office visits, prescriptions, and HCP name for the given ovID Used by viewOfficeVisit.jsp
    ViewPatientOfficeVisitHistoryAction
    Action class for ViewPatientOfficeVisitHistory.jsp
    ViewPersonnelAction
    Handles retrieving personnel beans for a given personnel Used by viewPersonnel.jsp
    ViewPrescriptionRecordsAction
    Handles retrieving beans for viewPrescriptionRecords.jsp
    ViewPrescriptionRenewalNeedsAction  
    ViewReportAction
    Action class for ViewReport.jsp
    ViewSurveyResultAction
    This class is used to handle retrieving survey results from the database.
    ViewVisitedHCPsAction
    Action class for ViewVisitedHCPs.jsp
